description: Manage Java projects in Visual Studio Code
contributes.commands.java.project.addLib: Add a jar file or a folder to project classpath
contributes.commands.java.project.remove: Remove jar file from project classpath
configuration.java.dependency.showMember: Show the members in the explorer
configuration.java.dependency.syncWithFo: Synchronize Java Projects explorer selection with folder explorer
configuration.java.dependency.autoRefres: Synchronize Java Projects explorer with changes
configuration.java.dependency.refreshDel: The delay time (ms) the auto refresh is invoked when changes are detected
configuration.java.dependency.packagePre: Package presentation mode: flat or hierarchical
configuration.java.project.exportJar.tar: The default output path of export jar
taskDefinitions.java.project.exportJar.e: The content list of export jar task. If defined, the step to select elements will be ignored.
taskDefinitions.java.project.exportJar.m: The main method in the manifest of exported jar. If defined, the step to select main method will be ignored.
taskDefinitions.java.project.exportJar.t: The output path of the exported jar. Will override the setting in settings.json.
